A C H M O R S 

A

Application - Class in com.soccerbuddy.service
The spring application runner.
Application() - Constructor for class com.soccerbuddy.service.Application
 
auditServiceMethod(ProceedingJoinPoint, Resource, ServiceMethod) - Method in class com.soccerbuddy.service.ServiceMethodHandler
Intercepts and advises all the web service methods annotated with @ServiceMethod.

C

com.soccerbuddy.service - package com.soccerbuddy.service
Contains classes useful to all the web services like the Spring Boot Application class, model objects, exceptions and such.
com.soccerbuddy.service.profile - package com.soccerbuddy.service.profile
Contains all the controllers this web service requires to manage the user and group profiles.
com.soccerbuddy.service.registration - package com.soccerbuddy.service.registration
Contains all the controllers this web service requires to manage the registration and unregistration of users and groups.

H

handleException(MethodArgumentNotValidException) - Method in class com.soccerbuddy.service.RequestValidationExceptionHandler
 
handleException(E) - Method in interface com.soccerbuddy.service.ResourceExceptionHandler
Handles the given exception producing a JSON content of an error object containing the complete context of the failure.
handleException(RuntimeException) - Method in class com.soccerbuddy.service.RuntimeExceptionHandler
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.soccerbuddy.service.Application
Marks the start of the application execution.

O

ofyFilter() - Method in class com.soccerbuddy.service.Application
Returns an Objectify filter to cleanup any thread-local contexts and pending async operations that remain at the end of a request.
ofyFilterRegistration() - Method in class com.soccerbuddy.service.Application
Registers an Objectify filter to cleanup any thread-local contexts and pending async operations that remain at the end of a request.

R

RequestValidationExceptionHandler - Class in com.soccerbuddy.service
Handles all the failed web service request validations resulting in MethodArgumentNotValidExceptions.
RequestValidationExceptionHandler() - Constructor for class com.soccerbuddy.service.RequestValidationExceptionHandler
 
ResourceExceptionHandler<E> - Interface in com.soccerbuddy.service
Handles the exceptions thrown by the web service operations (i.e the controllers).
RuntimeExceptionHandler - Class in com.soccerbuddy.service
Handles all the failed request validations resulting in MethodArgumentNotValidExceptions.
RuntimeExceptionHandler() - Constructor for class com.soccerbuddy.service.RuntimeExceptionHandler
 

S

ServiceMethodHandler - Class in com.soccerbuddy.service
The AOP utility that point cuts the web service methods and advises them.
ServiceMethodHandler() - Constructor for class com.soccerbuddy.service.ServiceMethodHandler
